products.name: Frozen Green Peas
products.description: Premium quality frozen green peas, handpicked and quick-frozen to preserve their natural sweetness and nutritional value. Perfect for curries, rice dishes, and snacks.

products.name: Frozen Sweet Corn
products.description: Golden sweet corn kernels frozen at peak freshness. A versatile ingredient for soups, salads, and Indian dishes. Rich in vitamins and naturally sweet.

products.name: Frozen Mix Vegetables
products.description: A carefully selected blend of premium vegetables including peas, carrots, beans, and corn. Perfect for quick meals, pulao, and Chinese dishes.
